data.text: He wode Philaxoossay ista suuthi ista yarshora gathi walakida Galila asata gish Yesussas yoottida asati heen iza ollan deetes.
Izikka zaaridi histtini hessamala waayey ista bolla gakkida asati hankko waayey gakkonta attida Galila asa wursotappe aadhdhida nagarancha gidida gish giidi qoppetii? gides.
Gideena ta intes yootays inte maaretonta ixxikko inte wurikka he asata mala dhayana.
Woykko Salhomen gimbey ista bolla wodhdhin hayqqida, tammanne osppun asati Yerusalemen diza asa wursofe nagarancha gididagish giidi qoppetii?
Gideenna ta intes yootays inte maaretonta ixxikko inte wurikka he asata mala dhayanan.
Qassekka istas issi uray woyne tookkizasson tokkettida issi balase giza mith daysu, he balase miththaykko ayfe koshshu yiidi issi ayfekka demmibeynna.

Woyne akakkiltte oothizaysas “hekko tani ayfe demmna gaada hachchra heezzu layth ha balaseykko simerista yaada issi ayfekka demabeykke, hessa gish izo qanxxa diga, aazas coo biitta xunxazee?” giidi leemuso yootides.
Izika zaaridi Godo tani izi xaphon osha yeggada oothetha xeellana mala halaythas agaggarkkii.
Yiza laythas iza ayfikko lo7o, ayfonta ixxikko qanxxanddasa gides.
Yesussay sanbbata gallas issi mukuraben tamaarisishin
tammanne osppun layth kumeth iita ayaanaay oykkidi asatetha pacisida issi maccashya heen daysu, izakka zokkoy kuunnida gish mulekka dhoqqu gaanas dandda7ukku
Yesussay izo beyidinne xeeygidi hanne maccashaye neni nena sakkiza hargezappe paxaddasakko gides.
Izi ba kushe izi bolla wothini iza heeraka sit gaada eqqadus, Xoossakka galatadus.

Mukurabe halaqqazikka sanbbata gallas pathidaysas Yesussa bolla hanqqettidi izakko yiza dereza “oothos bessiza usuppun gallasati diza gish he ootho galassatan yiidi paxite attin sanbbata gallas yooppite” gides.
Godaykka zaaridi inteno qoodheppe qommon haasa7izayto inte garsafe issi uray ba boora woykko ba hare sanbbata gallas beson qachchettidasooppe birshiddi haathe ushanaas efi erennee?
Histtin hanna maccashiya Abrame na gidada tammanne osppun layth kumeth xalla7ey qachchin diza sooppe sanbbata gallas birshettanas izis besennee? gides
Yesussay hizgi oychchida wode izara eqqettizayti wurikka yelattida, gido attin derey wurikka izi oychchida malalisiza oychcho wurson ufa7ettides.
Qassekka Yesussay zaaridi Xoossa kawotethi ay milatizee? Izo aazara leemusoo?
Issi uray etha ayfe ba gadeni tookkini mokada diccada gita gidiin kafoti izi hangge giddon duusasso giigissana gakanas dicida etha mith milataysu gides.
Qassekka Xoossa kawotethi aazara leemusoo?
Issi maccash munuqa caallisanas daro dhiillera walakkida guutha irsho malaataysu gides.
Hessafe guye Yesussay Yerusaleme bishe kanthi biza katamanne gutatan asa tamaarisishe aadhdhishin,
issi uray izakko shiiqidi “Godo firdappe guutha asati xalla atannee?” giidi oychchides. Izikka zaaridi xuntha pengeyra gelanaas baxxettite, daroti gelanaas koyetes shin istas hanena.
Keetha Goday denddidi ba kare gordi gidiin inte karen eqqidi Godo kare doyarkki giidi pengge qoxana shin izi zaaridi inte oonakkone awappe yidakkone ta intena erikke gaana gides.
Intenikka izas zaaridi nuni nenara issife midosinne issife uydos nu dubbushan nuna ne tamaarsadasa gaana.
Izika zaaridi intena inte oonakkone inte awappe yidakko ta intena erikke inte makkal7ati wurikka tappe haakkite gaana gides.
Inte Abramenne Yisaqqane Yaqobe nabeta wursota Xoossa kawotethan beyiza wode inte karen yegetti attizza wode he wode intes yeehonne achche garcethi gidana.
Asay away mokiza baggafenne wiliza baggafe pude baggafenne duge baggafe yiidi Xoossa kawotetha maaddan uttana.
Hekko guyyen dizaytappe bagaz sinthe aadhdhanna sinthan dizaytappe baggati guye aadhdhannayti deetes.
He wode Farsawistappe issi issi assi yiidi “Herdoossay nena wodhanas koyiza gish hayssafe dendda kichcha” gida.
Yesussay istas “tani buro hachchine wontoone dayiddanthata asappe kessana harggizaytakka pathana heezantho gallas ta ammoso ta gathanna gides gidi he worikkenas yootite” gides.
Gido attin nabey Yerusalemeppe karen hayqqanas besontta gish hachchine wonto wontofeinikka ta hamuth sinth gujjana gides.
Hanne Yerusaleme nabeta wodhizare neekko kitettiddayta shuuchchara caddizare kuttoy ba ciyista ba qefe gars shiishiza mala ne nayta shishanas aappun wode koyadinashin inte gakkides akkay gidista.
Hekko inte keethay kayzides ta intes yootays Goda sunthan yiza uray anjjettides inte gaana wodey gakanashe nam77antho tana beyekista.
